title: As a creator, I'd love to give you guys the Infernal Amumu chroma.
body:
Only problem is, since I'm not an established creator I'm just getting a kick in the ass instead as Riot supports people who are vastly more well known than I am and telling me to "figure it out". Literally the opposite of supporting upcoming creators like they say they want to do.

Established ones with 100k+ subs though? Yeah slather them with gifts. That is really helping the little guys trying to make it.
